entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of snow. High minus 12.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow beginning early this morning. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h. High minus 12. Wind chill minus 25 this morning and minus 18 this afternoon. Forecast issued 06:15 AM CST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 12. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming east 20 km/h gusting to 40 this evening. Temperature steady near minus 12. Wind chill near minus 22. Forecast issued 06:15 AM CST Tuesday 27 December 2022
